00047 #define MEAN_COLOR(c1, c2) QColor( (c1.red()+c2.red())/2, (c1.green()+c2.green())/2, (c1.blue()+c2.blue())/2 );
00048 
00049 /*
00050 Compile time hard-coded setting that defines the total number of rows a grid
00051 layout within the menu group can have. This has to be hardcoded. If we give
00052 too much flexibility, then we may land up messing up with the whole effect.
00053 */
00054 const int MaxRows = 2;
00055 const int ActionContainerMargin = 2;
00056 const int GroupSpacing = 2;

00062 namespace GCF
00063 {
00064         class ScrollArea : public QScrollArea
00065         {
00066         public:
00067                 ScrollArea(QWidget* parent=0) : QScrollArea(parent) { }
00068                 ~ScrollArea() { }
00069                 void scrollBy(int dx, int dy) {
00070                         QWidget* w = this->widget();
00071                         if(w->width() < width())
00072                                 return;
00073 
00074                         QPoint pos = w->pos();
00075                         pos.setX( pos.x() + dx );
00076                         pos.setY( pos.y() + dy );
00077                         if(pos.x() > 0)
00078                                 pos.setX(0);
00079                         else if(pos.x() < -(w->width()-this->width()))
00080                                 pos.setX(-(w->width()-this->width()));
00081                         w->move(pos);
00082                 }
00083         };
00084 
00085         class GroupContainer : public QWidget
00086         {
00087         public:
00088                 GroupContainer(QWidget* parent=0) : QWidget(parent), m_locked(false) { }
00089                 ~GroupContainer() { }
00090 
00091                 void lockPos() { 
00092                         if(m_locked)
00093                                 return;
00094                         m_locked = true; 
00095                         m_lockedPos = this->pos(); 
00096                 }
00097 
00098                 void unlockPos() { 
00099                         startTimer(200);
00100                 }
00101 
00102                 void paintEvent(QPaintEvent* pe);
00103                 bool event(QEvent* e);
00104                 void timerEvent(QTimerEvent* te) {
00105                         m_locked = false;
00106                         killTimer(te->timerId());
00107                 }
00108 
00109         private:
00110                 QPoint m_lockedPos;
00111                 bool m_locked;
00112         };
00113 }

00218 GCF::MenuStrip::MenuStrip(QWidget* parent)
00219 :QWidget(parent)
00220 {
00221     d = new GCF::MenuStripData;
00222     d->scrollArea = new GCF::ScrollArea(this);
00223     d->groupContainer = new GCF::GroupContainer(d->scrollArea);
00224     d->scrollArea->setWidget(d->groupContainer);
00225     d->scrollArea->setWidgetResizable(true);
00226     d->scrollArea->setHorizontalScrollBarPolicy(Qt::ScrollBarAlwaysOff);
00227     d->scrollArea->setVerticalScrollBarPolicy(Qt::ScrollBarAlwaysOff);
00228     d->scrollArea->setFrameStyle(QFrame::NoFrame);
00229 
00230     QHBoxLayout* layout = new QHBoxLayout(d->groupContainer);
00231     layout->setSpacing(1+GroupSpacing);
00232     layout->setMargin(GroupSpacing/2);
00233     layout->addItem(new QSpacerItem(20, 10, QSizePolicy::Expanding));
00234     d->groupContainerLayout = layout;
00235 
00236     d->scrollArea->installEventFilter(this);
00237     d->groupContainer->installEventFilter(this);
00238 }

00267 GCF::MenuStripGroup* GCF::MenuStrip::group(int index) const

00275 int GCF::MenuStrip::heightForWidth(int) const
00276 {
00277     int ret = (fontMetrics().height()+fontMetrics().ascent())*(MaxRows+2)+2*GroupSpacing;
00278     return ret;

00290 
00291 void GCF::MenuStrip::registerGroup(GCF::MenuStripGroup* group, GCF::MenuStripGroup* before)
00292 {
00293     if(!d || d->groupList.contains(group))
00294         return;
00295 
00296     if(before)
00297     {
00298         int index = d->groupContainerLayout->indexOf(before);
00299         if(index < 0)
00300             d->groupContainerLayout->insertWidget(d->groupContainerLayout->count()-1, group);
00301         else
00302             d->groupContainerLayout->insertWidget(index, group);
00303     }
00304     else
00305     {
00306         d->groupContainerLayout->insertWidget(d->groupContainerLayout->count()-1, group);
00307     }
00308     d->groupList.append(group);
00309     group->installEventFilter(this);
00310 }
00311 
00312 void GCF::MenuStrip::unregisterGroup(GCF::MenuStripGroup* group)
00313 {
00314     if(!d || !d->groupList.contains(group))
00315         return;
00316 
00317     d->groupList.removeAll(group);
00318 }

00323     d->groupContainerLayout->setGeometry(d->groupContainer->rect());

00336 void GCF::MenuStrip::ensureVisible(GCF::MenuStripGroup* group, int requiredWidth)
00337 {
00338         QRect groupRect = group->geometry();
00339         QRect gcRect = d->groupContainer->geometry();
00340         QRect saRect = d->scrollArea->rect();
00341 
00342         if(requiredWidth > groupRect.width())
00343                 groupRect.setWidth(requiredWidth);
00344 
00345         int left = -gcRect.left();
00346         int right = left + saRect.width();
00347 
00348         if(groupRect.left() < left)
00349                 d->scrollArea->scrollBy( left-groupRect.left(), 0 );
00350         else if(groupRect.right() > right)
00351                 d->scrollArea->scrollBy( right-groupRect.right(), 0 );
00352 }

00356     QWidget::paintEvent(pe);
00357 }

00359 void GCF::MenuStrip::resizeEvent(QResizeEvent* re)
00360 {
00361     QWidget::resizeEvent(re);
00362     d->scrollArea->setGeometry(this->rect());
00363     for(int i=0; i<d->groupList.count(); i++)
00364         d->groupList[i]->recalculateSize();
00365 }
00366 
00367 bool GCF::MenuStrip::eventFilter(QObject* obj, QEvent* event)
00368 {
00369     GCF::MenuStripGroup* group = qobject_cast<GCF::MenuStripGroup*>(obj);
00370     if(group && d->groupList.contains(group))
00371     {
00372         QPoint dp;
00373         switch(event->type())
00374         {
00375         case QEvent::MouseButtonPress:
00376             d->mousePressed = true;
00377             d->mousePos = QCursor::pos();
00378             return false;
00379         case QEvent::MouseMove:
00380             if(!d->mousePressed)
00381                 break;
00382             dp = QCursor::pos() - d->mousePos;
00383             d->scrollArea->scrollBy(dp.x(), 0);
00384             d->mousePos = QCursor::pos();
00385             return true;
00386         case QEvent::MouseButtonRelease:
00387             d->mousePressed = false;
00388             return false;
00389         case QEvent::Wheel: {
00390             QWheelEvent* we = (QWheelEvent*)(event);
00391             int delta = 20 * int(we->delta()) / 120;
00392             d->scrollArea->scrollBy(delta, 0);
00393             we->accept();
00394             }
00395         default:
00396             break;
00397         }
00398     }
00399     else
00400     {
00401         if(event->type() == QEvent::Wheel)
00402             return true;
00403     }
00404 
00405     return false;
00406 }
00407 
00409 // GCF::GroupContainer
00411 
00412 void GCF::GroupContainer::paintEvent(QPaintEvent* pe)
00413 {
00414     Q_UNUSED(pe);
00415 
00416     QColor bottomColor = MEAN_COLOR(palette().midlight().color(), palette().highlight().color());
00417     QColor topColor = MEAN_COLOR(palette().window().color(), bottomColor);
00418 
00419     QLinearGradient gradient(rect().topLeft(), rect().bottomLeft());
00420     gradient.setColorAt(0.0, topColor);
00421     gradient.setColorAt(1.0, bottomColor);
00422 
00423     QPainter paint(this);
00424     paint.setRenderHints(QPainter::Antialiasing|QPainter::SmoothPixmapTransform|QPainter::TextAntialiasing);
00425     paint.fillRect(rect(), gradient);
00426 }
00427 
00428 bool GCF::GroupContainer::event(QEvent* e)
00429 {
00430         if(m_locked)
00431         {
00432                 switch(e->type())
00433                 {
00434                 case QEvent::Move:
00435                         move(m_lockedPos);
00436                         return true;
00437 
00438                 default:
00439                         break;
00440                 }
00441         }
00442 
00443         return QWidget::event(e);
00444 }

00463 GCF::MenuStripGroup::MenuStripGroup(GCF::MenuStrip* parent, GCF::MenuStripGroup* before)
00464 :QWidget(parent->groupContainer())
00465 {
00466     d = new GCF::MenuStripGroupData;
00467     d->parentMenuStrip = parent;
00468     d->actionContainer = new QWidget(this);
00469     d->groupMenu = new QMenu(this);
00470     d->groupDrawer = 0; //new GCF::MenuStripGroupDrawer(this); 
00471     // d->groupDrawer->setMaximumHeight(400);
00472     d->drawGroupTitle = true;
00473 
00474     d->gridLayout = new GCF::MenuStripGroupGridLayout;
00475     d->actionContainer->setLayout(d->gridLayout);
00476     d->actionContainer->installEventFilter(this);
00477     d->parentMenuStrip->registerGroup(this, before);
00478 
00479     int gSize=int((fontMetrics().height()+fontMetrics().ascent())*1.2);
00480     for(int i=0; i<MaxRows; i++)
00481         d->gridLayout->setRowMinimumHeight(i, gSize);
00482 
00483     recalculateSize();
00484 }

00528 {
00529     if(!d->groupDrawer)
00530         return;
00531 
00532     d->groupDrawer->removeWidget(widget);
00533     if( !d->groupDrawer->widgetCount() )
00534     {

00536         delete d->groupDrawer;
00537         d->groupDrawer = 0;
00538     }

00556 
00557 static QSize iconSize(28, 28);
00558 static int iconBorder = sqrt( double(iconSize.width()*iconSize.width()/4 + iconSize.height()*iconSize.height()/4) ) - iconSize.width()/2;
00559 
00560 void GCF::MenuStripGroup::paintEvent(QPaintEvent*)
00561 {
00562     QPainter paint(this);
00563     paint.setRenderHints(QPainter::Antialiasing|QPainter::TextAntialiasing|QPainter::SmoothPixmapTransform);
00564 
00565     QColor baseColor = palette().midlight().color();
00566     QColor bottomColor = MEAN_COLOR(palette().midlight().color(), palette().highlight().color());
00567     QColor topColor = MEAN_COLOR(palette().window().color(), bottomColor);
00568 
00569     QRect rect = this->rect();
00570     QRect acRect = rect.adjusted(0, 0, 0, -(fontMetrics().height()+fontMetrics().ascent()));
00571 
00572     QLinearGradient gradient(acRect.topLeft(), acRect.bottomLeft());
00573     gradient.setColorAt(0.0, topColor);
00574     gradient.setColorAt(0.15, baseColor);
00575     gradient.setColorAt(0.2, topColor);
00576     gradient.setColorAt(1.0, bottomColor);
00577     paint.fillRect(acRect, gradient);
00578 
00579     if(d->drawGroupTitle)
00580     {
00581         paint.save();
00582         this->drawTextAndIcon(&paint, rect);
00583         paint.restore();
00584     }
00585 
00586     QColor borderColor(palette().highlight().color());
00587     borderColor.setAlphaF(0.7);
00588     paint.setPen( borderColor );
00589     paint.drawRect(0, 0, rect.width(), rect.height());
00590 }
00591 
00592 void GCF::MenuStripGroup::drawTextAndIcon(QPainter* paint, const QRect& rect)
00593 {
00594     QColor bottomColor = MEAN_COLOR(palette().midlight().color(), palette().highlight().color());
00595     QColor topColor = MEAN_COLOR(palette().window().color(), bottomColor);
00596     QColor textAreaColor = palette().highlight().color();
00597     QColor textColor = palette().highlightedText().color();
00598     QRect acRect = rect.adjusted(0, 0, 0, -groupTitleHeight());
00599     QRect textRect(rect.left(), acRect.bottom(), rect.width(), (rect.bottom()-acRect.bottom()));
00600     QRect iconRect(rect.left()+iconBorder, rect.bottom()-iconSize.height()-iconBorder, iconSize.width(), iconSize.height());
00601 
00602     QLinearGradient gradient;
00603     gradient.setStart(textRect.topLeft());
00604     gradient.setFinalStop(textRect.bottomLeft());
00605     gradient.setColorAt(0.0, textAreaColor);
00606     gradient.setColorAt(0.7, textAreaColor);
00607     gradient.setColorAt(1.0, topColor);
00608     paint->fillRect(textRect, gradient);
00609 
00610     if(!d->icon.isNull())
00611         textRect.setLeft(iconRect.right());
00612     paint->setPen(textColor);
00613     paint->drawText(textRect, Qt::AlignCenter, d->title);
00614 
00615     if(!d->icon.isNull())
00616     {
00617         QRect iconGradRect = iconRect.adjusted(-iconBorder, -iconBorder, iconBorder, iconBorder);
00618         QRadialGradient iconGrad(iconGradRect.center(), iconGradRect.width()>iconGradRect.height()?iconGradRect.height():iconGradRect.width());
00619         iconGrad.setColorAt(0.0, QColor(220, 230, 255, 32));
00620         iconGrad.setColorAt(0.8, QColor(255,255,255,200));
00621         iconGrad.setColorAt(1.0, QColor(240, 250, 255, 32));
00622 
00623         paint->setPen(QColor(240, 250, 255, 64));
00624         paint->setBrush(iconGrad);
00625         paint->drawEllipse(iconGradRect);
00626 
00627         iconRect = iconRect.adjusted(2,2,-2,-2);
00628         paint->drawPixmap(iconRect, d->icon.pixmap(iconSize));
00629     }
00630 
00631     // if there is a drawer sheet, then lets draw a down arrow to the right
00632     if(d->groupDrawer)
00633     {
00634         QIcon arrowIcon;
00635         if(d->groupDrawer->isVisible())
00636             arrowIcon = style()->standardIcon(QStyle::SP_ArrowUp);
00637         else
00638             arrowIcon = style()->standardIcon(QStyle::SP_ArrowDown);
00639 
00640         QRect aIconRect(rect.right()-iconBorder-iconSize.width(), 
00641                        rect.bottom()-iconSize.height()-iconBorder, 
00642                        iconSize.width(), iconSize.height());
00643         aIconRect = aIconRect.adjusted(3, 3, 3, 3);
00644         paint->drawPixmap(aIconRect, arrowIcon.pixmap(iconSize));
00645     }
00646 }
00647 
00648 void GCF::MenuStripGroup::resizeEvent(QResizeEvent*)
00649 {
00650     QRect rect = this->rect();
00651     QSize size = d->gridLayout->minimumSize();
00652     QRect acRect = rect.adjusted(ActionContainerMargin, ActionContainerMargin, -ActionContainerMargin, -(fontMetrics().height()+fontMetrics().ascent()));
00653     int heightDiff = acRect.height()-size.height();
00654     if(heightDiff > 0)
00655         acRect = acRect.adjusted(0, heightDiff/2, 0, -heightDiff/2);
00656     d->actionContainer->setGeometry(acRect);
00657 }
00658 
00659 void GCF::MenuStripGroup::mousePressEvent(QMouseEvent* me)
00660 {
00661     QRect rect = this->rect();
00662     QRect iconRect(rect.left()+iconBorder, rect.bottom()-iconSize.height()-iconBorder, iconSize.width(), iconSize.height());
00663     if( iconRect.contains(me->pos()) )
00664     {
00665         d->groupMenu->exec( mapToGlobal(rect.bottomLeft()) );
00666                 me->accept();
00667         return;
00668     }
00669 }
00670 
00671 void GCF::MenuStripGroup::mouseDoubleClickEvent(QMouseEvent* me)
00672 {
00673     if(!d->groupDrawer)
00674         return;
00675 
00676     if(me->y() >= height()-this->groupTitleHeight())
00677     {
00678         d->groupDrawer->toggleDrawer();
00679                 me->accept();
00680         return;
00681     }
00682 }
00683 
00684 void GCF::MenuStripGroup::recalculateSize()
00685 {
00686     int height = d->parentMenuStrip->groupContainerRect().height() - GroupSpacing;
00687     QSize size = d->gridLayout->minimumSize();
00688     QSize newSize(size.width()+ActionContainerMargin+ActionContainerMargin, height);
00689     if(newSize.width() < fontMetrics().width(d->title) + iconBorder + iconSize.width())
00690         newSize.setWidth(fontMetrics().width(d->title) + iconBorder + iconSize.width());
00691     if(newSize.width() < 100)
00692         newSize.setWidth(100);
00693     setFixedSize(newSize);
00694 }
00695 
00696 bool GCF::MenuStripGroup::event(QEvent* event)
00697 {
00698     switch(event->type())
00699     {
00700     case QEvent::ActionAdded:
00701         {
00702             QActionEvent* ae = (QActionEvent*)event;
00703             QAction* action = ae->action();
00704             QWidget* actionWidget = 0;
00705 
00706             int row=-1, col=-1;
00707             int rowSpan = action->property("rowSpan").toInt();
00708             int colSpan = action->property("colSpan").toInt();
00709             if(!rowSpan)
00710                 rowSpan = 1;
00711             if(!colSpan)
00712                 colSpan = 1;
00713             if(rowSpan > MaxRows)
00714                 rowSpan = MaxRows;
00715 
00716             actionWidget = createWidget(action, rowSpan, colSpan);
00717             d->gridLayout->findCell(rowSpan, colSpan, &row, &col);
00718             d->gridLayout->addWidget(actionWidget, row, col, rowSpan, colSpan, Qt::AlignJustify);
00719             d->actionWidgetMap[action] = actionWidget;
00720             action->setProperty("row", row);
00721             action->setProperty("col", col);
00722             actionWidget->show();
00723             recalculateSize();
00724             d->parentMenuStrip->updateLayout();
00725             d->groupMenu->addAction(action);
00726         }
00727         return true;
00728     case QEvent::ActionRemoved:
00729         {
00730             QActionEvent* ae = (QActionEvent*)event;
00731             QAction* action = ae->action();
00732             QWidget* actionWidget = d->actionWidgetMap.contains(action) ? d->actionWidgetMap[action] : 0;
00733             int row = action->property("row").toInt();
00734             int col = action->property("col").toInt();
00735             int rowSpan = action->property("rowSpan").toInt();
00736             int colSpan = action->property("colSpan").toInt();
00737 
00738             if(actionWidget && qobject_cast<QToolButton*>(actionWidget))
00739                 delete actionWidget;
00740             d->actionWidgetMap.remove(action);
00741             d->gridLayout->markCells(false, row, col, rowSpan, colSpan);
00742             recalculateSize();
00743             d->parentMenuStrip->updateLayout();
00744             d->groupMenu->removeAction(action);
00745         }
00746         return true;
00747         case QEvent::ToolTip:
00748                 {
00749                         if(d->groupDrawer)
00750                         {
00751                                 QString toolTip = d->groupDrawer->toolTipText();
00752                                 QRect ttRect(0, height()-this->groupTitleHeight(), width(), this->groupTitleHeight());
00753                                 QToolTip::showText(QCursor::pos(), toolTip, this, ttRect);
00754 
00755                                 return true;
00756                         }
00757                 }
00758 
00759     default:
00760         break;
00761     }
00762 
00763     return QWidget::event(event);
00764 }
00765 
00766 bool GCF::MenuStripGroup::eventFilter(QObject* obj, QEvent* event)
00767 {
00768     if(obj == d->actionContainer)
00769     {
00770         switch(event->type())
00771         {
00772         case QEvent::MouseButtonPress:
00773         case QEvent::MouseMove:
00774         case QEvent::MouseButtonRelease:
00775             return this->event(event);
00776         default:
00777             break;
00778         }
00779     }
00780     return false;
00781 }
00782 
00783 QWidget* GCF::MenuStripGroup::createWidget(QAction* action, int rowSpan, int colSpan)
00784 {
00785     QWidget* ret = 0;
00786     int gSize=int((fontMetrics().height()+fontMetrics().ascent())*1.2);
00787     int minWidth = gSize*colSpan;
00788 
00789     QWidgetAction* wAction = qobject_cast<QWidgetAction*>(action);
00790     if(wAction)
00791         ret = wAction->requestWidget(d->actionContainer);
00792     else
00793     {
00794         QToolButton* tb = new QToolButton(d->actionContainer);
00795         tb->setDefaultAction(action);
00796         tb->setAutoRaise(true);
00797         /*if(action->menu())
00798             tb->setMenu(action->menu());*/
00799         tb->setIconSize(QSize(gSize-4,gSize-4));
00800 
00801         if(action->icon().isNull())
00802             tb->setToolButtonStyle(Qt::ToolButtonTextOnly);
00803         else if(colSpan == rowSpan && colSpan >= 2)
00804             tb->setToolButtonStyle(Qt::ToolButtonTextUnderIcon);
00805         else if(colSpan == rowSpan && colSpan == 1)
00806             tb->setToolButtonStyle(Qt::ToolButtonIconOnly);
00807         else if(colSpan >= 2 || rowSpan == 1)
00808             tb->setToolButtonStyle(Qt::ToolButtonTextBesideIcon);
00809         else if(rowSpan >= 3)
00810             tb->setToolButtonStyle(Qt::ToolButtonTextUnderIcon);
00811 
00812         int mw = 0;
00813         if(tb->toolButtonStyle() != Qt::ToolButtonIconOnly)
00814             mw += fontMetrics().width(action->iconText())+2*fontMetrics().width("_");
00815 
00816         if(!action->icon().isNull())
00817         {
00818             switch(tb->toolButtonStyle())
00819             {
00820             case Qt::ToolButtonTextUnderIcon:
00821                 if(mw < gSize-4)
00822                     mw = gSize-4;
00823                 break;
00824             case Qt::ToolButtonTextBesideIcon:
00825                 mw += gSize-4;
00826             break;
00827             }
00828         }
00829         if(minWidth < mw)
00830             minWidth = mw;
00831 
00832         if(action->menu())
00833         {
00834             // Connect the default action object to the tool button. This way
00835             // when the toolbutton with menu is clicked, the default action is
00836             // shown.
00837             QList<QAction*> actions = action->menu()->actions();
00838             QAction* defAction = 0;
00839             for(int i=0; i<actions.count(); i++)
00840             {
00841                 QAction* action = actions[i];
00842                 QList<QByteArray> propNames = action->dynamicPropertyNames();
00843                 if(propNames.contains("_default_"))
00844                 {
00845                     bool val = action->property("_default_").toBool();
00846                     if(val)
00847                     {
00848                         defAction = action;
00849                         break;
00850                     }
00851                 }
00852             }
00853 
00854             if(defAction)
00855             {
00856                 if(defAction->isCheckable())
00857                     connect(tb, SIGNAL(clicked()), defAction, SLOT(toggle()));
00858                 else
00859                     connect(tb, SIGNAL(clicked()), defAction, SLOT(trigger()));
00860 
00861                 QFont font = defAction->font();
00862                 font.setBold(true);
00863                 defAction->setFont(font);
00864             }
00865         }
00866 
00867         ret = tb;
00868     }
00869 
00870     ret->setMinimumSize(minWidth, gSize*rowSpan);
00871 
00872     if(!action->icon().isNull())
00873     {
00874         QFont font = ret->font();
00875         // font.setPointSize(font.pointSize()-1);
00876         ret->setFont(font);
00877     }
00878 
00879     /*static QPlastiqueStyle Style;
00880     ret->setStyle(&Style);*/
00881 
00882     return ret;
00883 }
00884 
00885 void GCF::MenuStripGroup::setDrawGroupTitle(bool val)
00886 {
00887     if(d->drawGroupTitle == val)
00888         return;
00889 
00890     d->drawGroupTitle = val;
00891     update();
00892 }
00893 
00894 bool GCF::MenuStripGroup::isDrawGroupTitle() const
00895 {
00896     return d->drawGroupTitle;
00897 }
00898 
00899 int GCF::MenuStripGroup::groupTitleHeight() const
00900 {
00901     return fontMetrics().height()+fontMetrics().ascent();
00902 }
00903 
00904 void GCF::MenuStripGroup::ensureVisible(int requiredWidth)
00905 {
00906         d->parentMenuStrip->ensureVisible(this, requiredWidth);
00907 }
00908 
00910 // GCF::MenuStripGroupGridLayout
00912 
00913 struct GCF::MenuStripGroupGridLayoutData
00914 {
00915     QVector<bool> gridMatrix;
00916     int rowCount;
00917     int colCount;
00918 };
00919 
00920 GCF::MenuStripGroupGridLayout::MenuStripGroupGridLayout(QWidget* parentWidget)
00921 :QGridLayout(parentWidget)
00922 {
00923     d = new GCF::MenuStripGroupGridLayoutData;
00924     d->rowCount = MaxRows;
00925     d->colCount = 1;
00926     d->gridMatrix = QVector<bool>(MaxRows);
00927     for(int i=0; i<d->gridMatrix.count(); i++)
00928         d->gridMatrix[i] = false;
00929 
00930     setSpacing(0);
00931     setMargin(0);
00932 }
00933 
00934 GCF::MenuStripGroupGridLayout::~MenuStripGroupGridLayout()
00935 {
00936     delete d;
00937 }
00938 
00939 void GCF::MenuStripGroupGridLayout::findCell(int rowSpan, int colSpan, int* row, int* col, bool mark)
00940 {
00941     if(!row || !col)
00942         return;
00943 
00944     *row = 0;
00945     *col = 0;
00946 
00947     for(int j=0; j<d->colCount; j++)
00948     {
00949         if(j+colSpan > d->colCount)
00950             indexOf(0, d->colCount+colSpan);
00951         for(int i=0; i<d->rowCount; i++)
00952         {
00953             if(i+rowSpan > d->rowCount)
00954                 break;
00955             bool marked = isCellsMarked(i, j);
00956             if(!marked)
00957             {
00958                 bool success = isCellsMarked(i, j, rowSpan, colSpan);
00959                 if(!success)
00960                 {
00961                     *row = i;
00962                     *col = j;
00963                     if(mark)
00964                         markCells(true, i, j, rowSpan, colSpan);
00965                     return;
00966                 }
00967             }
00968         }
00969     }
00970 
00971     *row = 0;
00972     *col = d->colCount;
00973     if(mark)
00974         markCells(true, 0, d->colCount, rowSpan, colSpan);
00975     return;
00976 }
00977 
00978 void GCF::MenuStripGroupGridLayout::markCells(bool val, int row, int col, int rowSpan, int colSpan)
00979 {
00980     for(int i=row; i<row+rowSpan; i++)
00981     {
00982         for(int j=col; j<col+colSpan; j++)
00983         {
00984             int index = indexOf(i, j);
00985             if(index >= 0)
00986                 d->gridMatrix[index] = val;
00987         }
00988     }
00989 }
00990 
00991 bool GCF::MenuStripGroupGridLayout::isCellsMarked(int row, int col, int rowSpan, int colSpan)
00992 {
00993     bool ret = false;
00994 
00995     if(rowSpan == 1 && colSpan == 1)
00996     {
00997         int index = indexOf(row, col);
00998         return d->gridMatrix[index];
00999     }
01000 
01001     for(int i=row; i<row+rowSpan; i++)
01002     {
01003         for(int j=col; j<col+colSpan; j++)
01004         {
01005             int index = indexOf(i, j);
01006             ret &= d->gridMatrix[index];
01007             if(!ret)
01008                 return false;
01009         }
01010     }
01011     return true;
01012 }
01013 
01014 void GCF::MenuStripGroupGridLayout::markAllCells(bool val)
01015 {
01016     for(int i=0; i<d->gridMatrix.count(); i++)
01017         d->gridMatrix[i] = val;
01018 }
01019 
01020 int GCF::MenuStripGroupGridLayout::indexOf(int row, int col) const
01021 {
01022     if(row < 0 || row >= d->rowCount)
01023         return -1;
01024     if(col < 0 || col >= d->colCount)
01025     {
01026         QVector<bool> newVec(d->rowCount*(col+1));
01027         for(int i=0; i<newVec.count(); i++)
01028             newVec[i] = false;
01029         for(int i=0; i<d->rowCount; i++)
01030         {
01031             for(int j=0; j<d->colCount; j++)
01032             {
01033                 int oldIndex = i*d->colCount + j;
01034                 int newIndex = i*(col+1) + j;
01035                 newVec[newIndex] = d->gridMatrix[oldIndex];
01036             }
01037         }
01038         d->colCount = col+1;
01039         d->gridMatrix = newVec;
01040     }
01041     return row*d->colCount + col;
01042 }
01043 
01045 // GCF::MenuStripGroupDrawer
01047 
01048 const int MaxDrawerFrames = 100;
01049 
01050 namespace GCF
01051 {
01052     struct MenuStripGroupDrawerData
01053     {
01054         MenuStripGroupDrawerData() : timeline(0), state(GCF::MenuStripGroupDrawer::Close),
01055             maxHeight(0), currentHeight(0), heightPerFrame(0), 
01056                         parentGroupMinWidth(0), parentGroupMaxWidth(0), parentGroupWidthPerFrame(0),
01057                         refreshToolTip(false) { }
01058 
01059         QTimeLine* timeline;
01060         GCF::MenuStripGroupDrawer::DrawerState state;
01061         GCF::MenuStripGroup* parentGroup;
01062 
01063         int minHeight;
01064         int maxHeight;
01065         int currentHeight;
01066         qreal heightPerFrame;
01067 
01068         int parentGroupMinWidth;
01069         int parentGroupMaxWidth;
01070         qreal parentGroupWidthPerFrame;
01071 
01072         QList<QWidget*> widgetList;
01073         QWidget* drawerContainer;
01074         QVBoxLayout* layout;
01075         QSize maxSize;
01076         QPixmap drawerContainerPm;
01077 
01078                 bool refreshToolTip;
01079                 QString toolTipText;
01080 
01081         void grabDrawerContainer();
01082     };
01083 }
01084 
01085 GCF::MenuStripGroupDrawer::MenuStripGroupDrawer(GCF::MenuStripGroup* parent)
01086 :QWidget(parent, Qt::Popup|Qt::FramelessWindowHint|Qt::WindowStaysOnTopHint|Qt::CustomizeWindowHint)
01087 {
01088     d = new MenuStripGroupDrawerData;
01089     d->parentGroup = parent;
01090     d->timeline = new QTimeLine(300, this);
01091     d->timeline->setFrameRange(0, MaxDrawerFrames);
01092     connect(d->timeline, SIGNAL(frameChanged(int)), this, SLOT(timelineFrameChanged(int)));
01093     connect(d->timeline, SIGNAL(finished()), this, SLOT(timelineFinished()));
01094 
01095     d->drawerContainer = new QWidget(this);
01096     d->drawerContainer->setAutoFillBackground(false);
01097     d->drawerContainer->setAttribute(Qt::WA_NoSystemBackground);
01098     // d->drawerContainer->setAttribute(Qt::WA_OpaquePaintEvent);
01099     d->drawerContainer->hide();
01100     d->layout = new QVBoxLayout(d->drawerContainer);
01101 }
01102 
01103 GCF::MenuStripGroupDrawer::~MenuStripGroupDrawer()
01104 {
01105     delete d;
01106 }
01107 
01108 GCF::MenuStripGroupDrawer::DrawerState GCF::MenuStripGroupDrawer::drawerState() const
01109 {
01110     return d->state;
01111 }
01112 
01113 GCF::MenuStripGroup* GCF::MenuStripGroupDrawer::parentGroup() const
01114 {
01115     return d->parentGroup;
01116 }
01117 
01118 QString GCF::MenuStripGroupDrawer::toolTipText() const
01119 {
01120         if(d->refreshToolTip)
01121         {
01122                 int lastNewLine = 0;
01123                 d->toolTipText = "Double click to see ";
01124 
01125                 for(int i=0; i<d->widgetList.count(); i++)
01126                 {
01127                         QWidget* w = d->widgetList[i];
01128                         QLabel* label = (QLabel*)(w->property("QLabel*").value<QWidget*>());
01129 
01130                         if(i+1 < d->widgetList.count())
01131                                 d->toolTipText += QString("\"%1\", ").arg(label->text());
01132                         else
01133                                 d->toolTipText += QString("\"%1\"").arg(label->text());
01134 
01135                         if(d->toolTipText.length() - lastNewLine > 50)
01136                         {
01137                                 d->toolTipText += QString("\n");
01138                                 lastNewLine = d->toolTipText.length();
01139                         }
01140                 }
01141         }
01142 
01143         return d->toolTipText;
01144 }
01145 
01146 void GCF::MenuStripGroupDrawer::addWidget(QWidget* w)
01147 {
01148     if( d->widgetList.contains(w) || !w)
01149         return;
01150 
01151     if(d->state == Open || d->state == Opening)
01152         closeDrawer(); 
01153 
01154     QColor color = palette().highlightedText().color();
01155     QColor bgColor = palette().highlight().color();
01156     QString ss = QString(
01157         "color: rgb(%1, %2, %3);\n"
01158         "background-color: rgb(%4, %5, %6);\n"
01159         ).arg(color.red()).arg(color.green()).arg(color.blue())
01160         .arg(bgColor.red()).arg(bgColor.green()).arg(bgColor.blue());
01161 
01162     QLabel* label = new QLabel(this);
01163     label->setText(w->windowTitle());
01164     label->setStyleSheet(ss);
01165     label->setSizePolicy(QSizePolicy::Expanding, QSizePolicy::Fixed);
01166     label->setMargin(2);
01167     d->layout->addWidget(label);
01168     d->layout->addWidget(w);
01169     d->widgetList.append(w);
01170 
01171     // Ensure that the widget is shown. Sometimes the caller might have
01172     // explicitly hidden the widget.
01173     w->setVisible(true);
01174         d->refreshToolTip = true;
01175 
01176     w->setProperty( "QLabel*", qVariantFromValue<QWidget*>( (QWidget*)(label) ) );
01177 }
01178 
01179 void GCF::MenuStripGroupDrawer::removeWidget(QWidget* w)
01180 {
01181     if( !w || !d->widgetList.contains(w) )
01182         return;
01183 
01184     QLabel* label = (QLabel*)(w->property("QLabel*").value<QWidget*>());
01185     delete label;
01186     d->widgetList.removeAll(w);
01187     d->layout->removeWidget(w);
01188         d->refreshToolTip = true;
01189 }
01190 
01191 int GCF::MenuStripGroupDrawer::widgetCount() const
01192 {
01193     return d->widgetList.count();
01194 }
01195 
01196 QWidget* GCF::MenuStripGroupDrawer::widget(int index) const
01197 {
01198     if(index < 0 || index >= d->widgetList.count())
01199         return 0;
01200 
01201     return d->widgetList[index];
01202 }
01203 
01204 void GCF::MenuStripGroupDrawer::openDrawer()
01205 {
01206         // Make sure that the menu strip doesnt scroll, and that the parent group is visible
01207     computeMaximumSize();
01208         d->parentGroup->ensureVisible(d->maxSize.width()+20);
01209         d->parentGroup->parentMenuStrip()->lockGroupContainer();
01210 
01211     // Compute the area where the drawer needs to be shown.
01212     QRect rect = d->parentGroup->rect();
01213     QPoint blPt = rect.bottomLeft() - QPoint(0, d->parentGroup->groupTitleHeight());
01214     blPt = d->parentGroup->mapToGlobal( blPt );
01215 
01216     // Compute the growth strategy of the drawer
01217     d->minHeight = d->parentGroup->groupTitleHeight();
01218     d->maxHeight = d->maxSize.height();
01219     d->currentHeight = d->minHeight;
01220     d->heightPerFrame = qreal(d->maxHeight - d->currentHeight)/qreal(MaxDrawerFrames);
01221 
01222     // Adjust the width if needed
01223     if(rect.width() < d->maxSize.width())
01224         rect.setWidth( d->maxSize.width() );
01225 
01226     // Find out if the parent group also has to be expanded....
01227     d->parentGroupMinWidth = d->parentGroup->minimumWidth();
01228     d->parentGroupMaxWidth = d->maxSize.width();
01229         if(d->parentGroupMaxWidth < d->parentGroupMinWidth)
01230                 d->parentGroupMaxWidth = d->parentGroupMinWidth;
01231     if(d->parentGroupMinWidth < d->parentGroupMaxWidth)
01232         d->parentGroupWidthPerFrame = qreal(d->parentGroupMaxWidth-d->parentGroupMinWidth)/qreal(MaxDrawerFrames);
01233     else
01234         d->parentGroupWidthPerFrame = 0;
01235 
01236     // Capture the drawer container widget
01237         QRect dcRect = computeDrawerContainerRect(rect);
01238     d->drawerContainer->setGeometry(dcRect);
01239         if(d->drawerContainerPm.isNull())
01240                 d->grabDrawerContainer();
01241 
01242     // Show the drawer for the first time.
01243     setGeometry(blPt.x(), blPt.y(), rect.width(), d->currentHeight);
01244     show();
01245     
01246     // The tray is opening now.
01247     d->state = Opening;
01248     d->drawerContainer->hide();
01249 
01250     // Start the timeline
01251     d->timeline->stop();
01252     d->timeline->setDirection(QTimeLine::Forward);
01253     d->timeline->start();
01254 }
01255 
01256 void GCF::MenuStripGroupDrawer::closeDrawer()
01257 {
01258     // min, max and current height are already computed during opening of the drawer
01259     d->state = Closing;
01260     d->drawerContainer->hide();
01261     qApp->removeEventFilter(this);
01262 
01263     // Capture the drawer container widget
01264     d->grabDrawerContainer();
01265 
01266     // Restart the timeline
01267     d->timeline->stop();
01268     d->timeline->setDirection(QTimeLine::Backward);
01269     d->timeline->start();
01270 }
01271 
01272 void GCF::MenuStripGroupDrawer::toggleDrawer()
01273 {
01274     if(d->state == Close)
01275         openDrawer();
01276     else if(d->state == Open)
01277         closeDrawer();  
01278 }
01279 
01280 void GCF::MenuStripGroupDrawer::resizeEvent(QResizeEvent* re)
01281 {
01282     QRect dcRect = computeDrawerContainerRect(this->rect());
01283     d->drawerContainer->setGeometry(dcRect);
01284 }
01285 
01286 void GCF::MenuStripGroupDrawer::paintEvent(QPaintEvent* pe)
01287 {
01288     QPainter paint(this);
01289     paint.setRenderHints(QPainter::Antialiasing|QPainter::TextAntialiasing|QPainter::SmoothPixmapTransform);
01290 
01291     // Draw the shadows and stuff..
01292     QPalette pal = d->parentGroup->palette();
01293     QColor bgColor = MEAN_COLOR(pal.light().color(), pal.highlight().color());
01294     QColor shadow = MEAN_COLOR(pal.shadow().color(), pal.highlight().color());
01295     paint.fillRect(this->rect(), bgColor);
01296 
01297     if(!d->drawerContainer->isVisible())
01298     {
01299         // If the drawer container is not visible, we render the widget on the screen
01300         // this state is true when the drawer is coming out
01301 
01302         // Figure out where the drawer rectangle needs to be drawn.
01303         QRect dcPlaceRect = computeDrawerContainerRect(this->rect());
01304         if(dcPlaceRect.height() < 0)
01305             return;
01306 
01307         // Figure out what part of the container should be drawn.
01308         QRect dcRect( QPoint(0, 0), d->layout->sizeHint() );
01309         dcRect.setTop( dcRect.bottom() - dcPlaceRect.height() );
01310 
01311         // Now lets perform the painting
01312         // d->drawerContainer->render(&paint, dcPlaceRect.topLeft(), dcRect);
01313         paint.drawPixmap(dcPlaceRect, d->drawerContainerPm, dcRect);
01314     }
01315 
01316     QRect shadowRect(0, 0, width(), 8);
01317 
01318     {
01319         QLinearGradient grad(shadowRect.topLeft(), shadowRect.bottomLeft());
01320         grad.setColorAt(0, shadow);
01321         grad.setColorAt(1, bgColor);
01322         paint.fillRect(shadowRect, grad);
01323     }
01324 
01325     shadowRect.moveTopLeft(shadowRect.topLeft() + QPoint(0, height()-d->parentGroup->groupTitleHeight()-9));
01326 
01327     {
01328         QLinearGradient grad(shadowRect.topLeft(), shadowRect.bottomLeft());
01329         grad.setColorAt(1, shadow);
01330         grad.setColorAt(0, bgColor);
01331         paint.fillRect(shadowRect, grad);
01332     }
01333 
01334     paint.setPen( shadow );
01335     paint.drawRect( this->rect().adjusted(0, 0, -1, -1) );
01336 
01337     d->parentGroup->drawTextAndIcon(&paint, this->rect());
01338 }
01339 
01340 void GCF::MenuStripGroupDrawer::showEvent(QShowEvent*)
01341 {
01342     d->parentGroup->setDrawGroupTitle(false);
01343         d->parentGroup->parentMenuStrip()->lockGroupContainer();
01344 }
01345 
01346 void GCF::MenuStripGroupDrawer::hideEvent(QHideEvent*)
01347 {
01348     d->parentGroup->setDrawGroupTitle(true);
01349         d->parentGroup->parentMenuStrip()->unlockGroupContainer();
01350     d->state = Close;
01351 }
01352 
01353 void GCF::MenuStripGroupDrawer::mousePressEvent(QMouseEvent* me)
01354 {
01355     int h = d->parentGroup->groupTitleHeight();
01356     if(me->y() < h || me->y() > height()-h)
01357     {
01358         closeDrawer();
01359         me->accept();
01360     }
01361 }
01362 
01363 void GCF::MenuStripGroupDrawer::computeMaximumSize()
01364 {
01365     int maxHeight = d->layout->sizeHint().height();
01366     maxHeight += 10 + // offset from the top edge
01367                 d->parentGroup->groupTitleHeight() + // offset for the group title bar
01368                 10; // Offset from the group title bar to the container
01369 
01370     int maxWidth = d->layout->sizeHint().width();
01371     maxWidth += 10 + // margin on left
01372                 10; // margin on right.
01373 
01374     d->maxSize = QSize(maxWidth, maxHeight);
01375 }
01376 
01377 QRect GCF::MenuStripGroupDrawer::computeDrawerContainerRect(const QRect& rect)
01378 {
01379     return rect.adjusted(10, // left margin
01380                          10, // top margin
01381                          -10, // right margin
01382                          -10 - d->parentGroup->groupTitleHeight());
01383 }
01384 
01385 void GCF::MenuStripGroupDrawer::timelineFrameChanged(int frame)
01386 {
01387     d->currentHeight = d->minHeight + int(d->heightPerFrame*qreal(frame));
01388     if(d->state == Opening)
01389     {
01390         if(d->currentHeight >= d->maxHeight)
01391         {
01392             d->timeline->stop();
01393             d->drawerContainer->show();
01394             d->state = Open;
01395         }
01396     }
01397     else if(d->state == Closing)
01398     {
01399         if(d->currentHeight <= d->minHeight + d->heightPerFrame*3)
01400         {
01401             d->timeline->stop();
01402             d->state = Close;
01403             if(d->parentGroupWidthPerFrame)
01404                 d->parentGroup->setFixedWidth(d->parentGroupMinWidth);
01405             hide();
01406         }
01407     }
01408 
01409     if( d->state != Close )
01410     {
01411         QRect geo = this->geometry();
01412         geo.setHeight( d->currentHeight );
01413         setGeometry(geo);
01414         show();
01415     }
01416 
01417     if(!d->parentGroupWidthPerFrame && d->state != Close)
01418         return;
01419 
01420     // Animate parent group width change if needed...
01421     int pgWidth = d->parentGroupMinWidth + int(d->parentGroupWidthPerFrame*qreal(frame));
01422     if(pgWidth < d->parentGroupMinWidth)
01423         pgWidth = d->parentGroupMinWidth;
01424     else if(pgWidth > d->parentGroupMaxWidth)
01425         pgWidth = d->parentGroupMaxWidth;
01426 
01427     d->parentGroup->setFixedWidth(pgWidth);
01428 }
01429 
01430 void GCF::MenuStripGroupDrawer::timelineFinished()
01431 {
01432     if(d->state == Opening)
01433     {
01434         // Compute the final geometry
01435         QRect geo = this->geometry();
01436         geo.setHeight( d->maxHeight );
01437         setGeometry(geo);
01438 
01439         d->drawerContainer->show();
01440         d->state = Open;
01441     }
01442     else if(d->state == Closing)
01443     {
01444         d->state = Close;
01445         if(d->parentGroupWidthPerFrame)
01446             d->parentGroup->setFixedWidth(d->parentGroupMinWidth);
01447     }
01448 }
01449 
01450 static void sendResizeEvents(QWidget *target)
01451 {
01452     QResizeEvent e(target->size(), QSize());
01453     QApplication::sendEvent(target, &e);
01454 
01455     const QObjectList children = target->children();
01456     for (int i = 0; i < children.size(); ++i) {
01457         QWidget *child = static_cast<QWidget*>(children.at(i));
01458         if (child->isWidgetType() && !child->isWindow() && child->testAttribute(Qt::WA_PendingResizeEvent))
01459             sendResizeEvents(child);
01460     }
01461 }
01462 
01463 void GCF::MenuStripGroupDrawerData::grabDrawerContainer()
01464 {
01465     /*
01466     The following code has been adopted from QPixmap::grabWidget().
01467     We dont want grabWidget to draw window background.
01468     */
01469     if (!drawerContainer)
01470         return;
01471 
01472     if (drawerContainer->testAttribute(Qt::WA_PendingResizeEvent) || !drawerContainer->testAttribute(Qt::WA_WState_Created))
01473         sendResizeEvents(drawerContainer);
01474 
01475     QPixmap res(drawerContainer->size());
01476     res.fill(Qt::transparent);
01477     drawerContainer->render(&res, QPoint(), QRect(), QWidget::DrawChildren);
01478 
01479     this->drawerContainerPm = res;
01480 }
